Replying to @ 2018-11-21 12:15
@bclawson780 @Netlify No. Hosting on @Netlify doesn't work quite like that. This would mean a server was generating a view for you to list all the files. @netlify serves your site as files directly from the CDN, so if you want this listing you'd need to generate it yourself in a build step as a page.
